BaseTemplate.description: Starter code for your Nextjs Boilerplate with Tailwind CSS

Index.meta_description: Next js Boilerplate is the perfect starter code for your project. Build your React application with the Next.js framework.

Counter.security_powered_by: Security, bot detection and rate limiting powered by

CounterForm.presentation: The counter is stored in the database and incremented by the value you provide.

About.about_paragraph: Welcome to our About page! We are a team of passionate individuals dedicated to creating amazing software.

Portfolio.presentation: Welcome to my portfolio page! Here you will find a carefully curated collection of my work and accomplishments. Through this portfolio, I'm to showcase my expertise, creativity, and the value I can bring to your projects.

PortfolioSlug.content: Created a set of promotional materials and branding elements for a corporate event. Crafted a visually unified theme, encompassing a logo, posters, banners, and digital assets. Integrated the client's brand identity while infusing it with a contemporary and innovative approach.

SignIn.meta_description: Seamlessly sign in to your account with our user-friendly login process.

SignUp.meta_description: Effortlessly create an account through our intuitive sign-up process.

Dashboard.alternative_message: Need advanced features? Multi-tenancy & Teams, Roles & Permissions, Shadcn UI, End-to-End Typesafety with oRPC, Stripe Payment, Light / Dark mode. Try <url></url>.

Pricing.meta_description: Transparent pricing tiers for the Next.js Boilerplate starter kit.
Pricing.hero_title: Pricing that scales with your roadmap
Pricing.hero_subtitle: Start for free and upgrade when you need dedicated support or custom integrations.

hobby.name: Hobby
hobby.description: Perfect for evaluating the template and standing up prototypes.
features: Type-safe API routes and DB layer

startup.name: Startup
startup.description: Launch a production SaaS with monitoring, security, and onboarding support.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For teams that need SLAs, private support channels, and bespoke work.

Pricing.cta_description: We partner with agencies and startups to tailor the boilerplate to multi-tenancy, customer dashboards, or bespoke workflows.

Features.meta_description: Explore the integrations and developer experience included in the Next.js Boilerplate.
Features.hero_title: Everything you need to launch confidently
Features.hero_subtitle: Built for fast iteration, hardened for production.
Features.grid_description: The toolkit is designed for developer productivity and long-term maintainability.

auth.title: Authentication adapters
auth.description: Switch between Clerk, Cloudflare Access, or AWS Cognito by changing a single environment variable.

database.title: Reliable database layer
database.description: Drizzle ORM with PostgreSQL, migrations, services, and example queries ready to use.

security.title: Security built-in
security.description: Arcjet bot mitigation, CSRF tokens, rate limiting, audit logging, and middleware helpers.

seo.title: SEO & i18n
seo.description: Structured data utilities, localized metadata builders, sitemaps, and hreflang support.

monitoring.title: Monitoring & logging
monitoring.description: Sentry, Better Stack, PostHog, and Checkly integrated with sensible defaults.

tooling.title: Developer tooling
tooling.description: ESLint, Prettier, Vitest, Playwright, Storybook, and Tailwind CSS v4 out of the box.

Features.deep_dives_description: Highlights of the systems that make the boilerplate stand out.
Features.middleware_description: Compose Arcjet protection, auth guards, routing, and headers in a single function.
middleware_benefits: Token-bucket rate limiting for API mutations
Arcjet bot detection with configurable rules
Features.marketing_description: Responsive hero sections, pricing tables, testimonials, and CTAs ready for reuse.
marketing_benefits: Tailwind CSS tokens ready for custom branding

Contact.meta_description: Get in touch for support, licensing, or custom feature work.
Contact.hero_title: We'd love to hear from you
Contact.hero_subtitle: Reach out for support, licensing, or custom feature work.
Contact.support_description: Email us for licensing questions, enterprise support, or onboarding help.
Contact.community_description: Join the conversation and get updates on upcoming features.
